### Therapy and Course ### Ad diagnostischer Einordnung

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. Details about the therapy program are missing.

### Ad integriertem Therapieprogramm

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. Details about the integrated treatment program are missing.

### Ad Psychopharmakologie

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. Information about psychopharmacology is missing.
- Specify which medications were used and their doses.
- Provide information on how long each medication was prescribed or taken.
- Detail any changes in medication throughout the stay and the reasons for those changes.

### Ad psychotherapeutischen Themen

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. More details about the psychotherapy sessions are missing.
- Explain specific therapeutic techniques used (e.g., cognitive restructuring).
- Describe patient engagement with therapy and progress made in changing thought patterns or behaviors.
- Mention any homework assignments given to the patient for practice outside of therapy.

### Ad sozialer Situation

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. Information about the social situation after discharge is missing.
- Provide details on how well the patient integrated back into their living situation and work life.
- Include any notable challenges or adjustments encountered by the patient in their social environment.

### Ad Verlauf

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. More information about the course of treatment is missing.
- Describe changes in symptoms over time, including an assessment of the severity of these symptoms at discharge.
- Mention any side effects of medications and how they were managed.
- Provide details on any setbacks or relapses during the treatment stay.

### Medikation bei Austritt

Mark 0: This section is incomplete. More information about medication upon discharge is missing.
- Include dosages for all prescribed medications.
- Detail specific instructions for each medication, including frequency of administration and potential interactions with other drugs.
